message: It doesn't feel like it, sadly. It's a great service. Maybe it should be marketed more.
I hope we hear something from the convore team.
maybe if they fix all the bugs and convore stops sucking so badly people will start using it.
I had never heard about it until I randomly stumbled on it from that "pokemon or startup" site. Seems good so far.

Apparently Eric Florenzano left in the summer of 2011, and Leah Culver remains at Convore. [source: http://www.quora.com/Is-Eric-Florenzano-still-part-of-Convore-now-that-he-is-working-on-CantWa-it] @drewmoh Latency at Convore is quite noticeable -- even when there's only one user online. What's up, @leah? fill us in here.
